column68: ]I remember somehow, someway[
column69: ]I remember somehow, someway[
column70: ]It was December of 2015 in sunny Los Angeles California[
column71: ]In the heart of Hollywood[
column72: ]I stood next to my wife in a line surrounded by hundreds of other people[
column73: ]On our way to watch Star Wars[
column74: ]When suddenly I was engulfed with fear and panic[
column75: ]As my body began to fade[
column76: ]In this moment my mind was full of clarity[
column77: ]But my body insisted it was in danger[
column78: ]I looked around and I told myself I was safe, I was fine[
column79: ]But I was convinced that something was wrong[
column80: ]Before I knew it I felt as though I was going to[
column81: ]Fall and fade away[
column82: ]My body grew weak[
column83: ]And soon enough I found myself in a hospital bed[
column84: ]Being told what I went through was anxiety[
column86: ]I searched and searched for the cause of what had happened to me[
column87: ]I began to feel detached from reality[
column88: ]I felt as though I was seeing the world through a glass[
column89: ]I got blood work done[
column90: ]Analysis of my mind and body to no avail[
column92: ]But how could it be anxiety?[
column93: ]How could anxiety make me physically feel off balance?[
column94: ]How could anxiety make me feel as though I was fading from this world[
column97: ]The sense of being out of one's body[
column98: ]I'm not here[
column99: ]I'm not me[
column100: ]I'm not real[
column102: ]Nothing but this feeling of panic[
column103: ]Nobody understands[
column109: ]Can it in fact be the mind controlling the body?[
column111: ]I'm so in control of my mind and my body[
column112: ]But I'm subconsciously forcing myself into a state[
column113: ]Of self bondage entangled by the ropes of my own mind[
column117: ]I am scared, I am human, I am a man[
column118: ]But I look in the mirror and I see a child[
column119: ]I am an adult who recognize grown ups don't really know shit[
column122: ]Cause now I'm just a grown up who doesn't know shit[
column123: ]But one thing is I do know this feeling, this horrible feeling is going to kill me[
column127: ]Just like you, the person I wrote this for[
column128: ]And together we will overcome this feeling[
column129: ]We will remember despite the attacks and constant feeling[
column130: ]Of our mind and body being on the edge[
column132: ]And any moments we have free of this feeling we will not take for granted[
column133: ]We will rejoice in this gift that is life[
column134: ]We will rejoice in this day that we have been given[
column135: ]We will accept our anxiety and strive for the betterment of ourselves[
column137: ]We will accept ourselves as we are[
column138: ]And we will be happy with the person we see in the mirror[

column176: ]God: What advice can I give humanity?[
column178: ]God: Live your life. Don't waste your days on the negative energy of others. Remember that you're not your salary. You're not your house. You're not your car. And no matter how big your bank account is, your grave is six feet under just like everyone else's. So enjoy the days you have. Worry not bout the days that came before you. Nor the ones that will follow you in death. Remember that right here in this moment is all you are guaranteed, and the fact that you are living is what life is all about. So live your life to the fullest, according to your happiness and the betterment of all[

column175: ]Atom: So what now? What advice can you give me?[
column176: ]God: What advice can I give humanity?[
column178: ]God: Live your life. Don't waste your days on the negative energy of others. Remember that you're not your salary. You're not your house. You're not your car. And no matter how big your bank account is, your grave is six feet under just like everyone else's. So enjoy the days you have. Worry not bout the days that came before you. Nor the ones that will follow you in death. Remember that right here in this moment is all you are guaranteed, and the fact that you are living is what life is all about. So live your life to the fullest, according to your happiness and the betterment of all[

column1: Waiting Room,So, we waiting for what?[
column2: ]Excuse me?[
column3: ]So you sittin here telling me, this place is a waiting room, right? What are we waiting for?[
column4: ]Rebirth[
column5: ]Rebirth?... like reincarnation?[
column6: ]If that's what you wanna call it[
column7: ]What the fuck you mean "if that's what I wanna call it?" [
column8: ]Either this is what it is, or this is[
column9: ]What it ain't[
column10: ]Sure[
column11: ]Chu mean? Ughhh, this muhfucka (Atom sighs in frustration)[
column12: ]Aight, lemme get this straight, every time I die, I come here, we talk, and you send me back to earth to be reborn?[
column13: ]ou know the last time we had this conversation it was in mandarin and you were 13 Atom: Mandarin?[
column14: ]And a girl![
column15: ]What? Nah, bruh, you fuckin wit me. You're... Like, Jesus Christ[
column16: ]He was here too![
column17: ]What? Wait, wait, so the Christians got it right?[
column18: ]Well I'm about to reincarnate you Atom. I'd say everyone kinda got it right[
column19: ]This is a whole lot to take in![
column20: ]I know trust me, I've been there[
column21: ]Sooooooo, how many times have I been reincarnated?[
column22: ]Many, many many many, many times[
column23: ]If it's so many times, why don't I remember?[
column24: ]f we stayed here long enough, the lives you have lived, and the knowledge from each of them would return[
column25: ]What?[
column26: ]'m actually about to send you back to 1736 as Bryan Fairfax, the 8th lord Fairfax of Cameron[
column27: ]Word, ayy, that sounds important[
column28: ]Oh yes you own 40,000 acres[
column29: ]God damn!...oh, I'm sorry[
column30: ]Ha, it's quite alright[
column31: ]Well at least I'm not poor no more[
column32: ]Well sure! with all that land and the hundreds of slaves you'll own[
column33: ]Slaves? Aw hell nah, nononono, look look look: how you gonna take a black man, send him back in time, and now I gotta own slaves?[
column34: ]Well if it's any consolation, your son Tom, the 9th Lord Fairfax of Cameron sets them free![
column35: ]No! That does not make me feel better at all[
column36: ]Wait hold up, I just realized... you said you're gonna send me back in time?[
column37: ]Well, I'm not really sending you back in time. that doesn't exist where I come from, only in your universe[
column38: ]Well, where are you from?[
column39: ]Honestly Atom, even if I explained where I came from, or told you about the others like me, you just wouldn't understand[
column40: ]But if there's others like you, how can you be god?[
column41: ]Atom, I said you wouldn't understand![
column42: ]Atom: So what's the point of doing all this?[
column43: ]Really?[
column44: ]What?[
column45: ]A little cliche don't you think? [
column46: ]Essentially asking Me the meaning of life[
column47: ]Well I figured I would ask before you send me back and I can't remember none of this. [
column48: ]Atom come here. the meaning of life... the reason I created this place...is so that you can grow, and mature[
column49: ]Like the human race? Like this is how the human race is supposed to grow and mature? mature into what? We can't even get along[
column50: ]No Atom, you! It's for you, you to mature[
column51: ]I don't understand[
column52: ]I created this place for you, Atom. [
column53: ]This entire place was made for you. [
column54: ]Every time I send you back, every life you live, you grow, and mature and understand the grand meaning behind all of this just a little more each time[
column55: ]Just me? Wait, what about everybody else?[
column56: ]Atom, there is no one else[
column57: ]I don't understand[
column58: ]Atom, you are every human being who has ever existed since the dawn of your kind on earth[
column59: ]Wait I'm everyone?[
column60: ]Aaahhhhh yes, now you are beginning to see it[
column61: ]So I'm like, everyone that ever existed on earth, ever?[
column62: ]Earth? Ha, that's cute. Earth was just your birthplace. [
column63: ]Let us not forget all the stars humanity will colonize over the millennia[
column64: ]Atom: Wait, that is so much. Too much to take in! [
column65: ]I'm every human being that ever lived?[
column68: ]And all of his disciples[
column69: ]I'm Hitler?[
column71: ]Atom: That's deep[
column72: ]You see Atom, every act of hatred and violence you committed against another, you were committing against yourself and every act of love and hand of kindness, you also extended unto yourself[
column73: ]God, why do all this?[
column74: ]Someday, long from now, you will become like me. [
column75: ]You will mature to become what I am. [
column76: ]I'm a god?[
column77: ]No, not yet. you see, I was once where you stand right now...[
column78: ]It is not until you have lived every human life inside of your universe that I may take you from this place. [
column79: ]Once you have walked in the shoes of every race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, loving and hateful person, it is only then that you will understand how precious life truly is

column21: ]Sooooooo, how many times have I been reincarnated?[
column22: ]Many, many many many, many times[
column23: ]If it's so many times, why don't I remember?[
column24: ]f we stayed here long enough, the lives you have lived, and the knowledge from each of them would return[
column25: ]What?[
column26: ]'m actually about to send you back to 1736 as Bryan Fairfax, the 8th lord Fairfax of Cameron[
column27: ]Word, ayy, that sounds important[
column28: ]Oh yes you own 40,000 acres[
column29: ]God damn!...oh, I'm sorry[
column30: ]Ha, it's quite alright[
column31: ]Well at least I'm not poor no more[
column32: ]Well sure! with all that land and the hundreds of slaves you'll own[
column33: ]Slaves? Aw hell nah, nononono, look look look: how you gonna take a black man, send him back in time, and now I gotta own slaves?[
column34: ]Well if it's any consolation, your son Tom, the 9th Lord Fairfax of Cameron sets them free![
column35: ]No! That does not make me feel better at all[
column36: ]Wait hold up, I just realized... you said you're gonna send me back in time?[
column37: ]Well, I'm not really sending you back in time. that doesn't exist where I come from, only in your universe[
column38: ]Well, where are you from?[
column39: ]Honestly Atom, even if I explained where I came from, or told you about the others like me, you just wouldn't understand[
column40: ]But if there's others like you, how can you be god?[
column41: ]Atom, I said you wouldn't understand![
column42: ]Atom: So what's the point of doing all this?[
column43: ]Really?[
column44: ]What?[
column45: ]A little cliche don't you think? [
column46: ]Essentially asking Me the meaning of life[
column47: ]Well I figured I would ask before you send me back and I can't remember none of this. [
column48: ]Atom come here. the meaning of life... the reason I created this place...is so that you can grow, and mature[
column49: ]Like the human race? Like this is how the human race is supposed to grow and mature? mature into what? We can't even get along[
column50: ]No Atom, you! It's for you, you to mature[
column51: ]I don't understand[
column52: ]I created this place for you, Atom. [
column53: ]This entire place was made for you. [
column54: ]Every time I send you back, every life you live, you grow, and mature and understand the grand meaning behind all of this just a little more each time[
column55: ]Just me? Wait, what about everybody else?[
column56: ]Atom, there is no one else[
column57: ]I don't understand[
column58: ]Atom, you are every human being who has ever existed since the dawn of your kind on earth[
column59: ]Wait I'm everyone?[
column60: ]Aaahhhhh yes, now you are beginning to see it[
column61: ]So I'm like, everyone that ever existed on earth, ever?[
column62: ]Earth? Ha, that's cute. Earth was just your birthplace. [
column63: ]Let us not forget all the stars humanity will colonize over the millennia[
column64: ]Atom: Wait, that is so much. Too much to take in! [
column65: ]I'm every human being that ever lived?[
column68: ]And all of his disciples[
column69: ]I'm Hitler?[
column71: ]Atom: That's deep[
column72: ]You see Atom, every act of hatred and violence you committed against another, you were committing against yourself and every act of love and hand of kindness, you also extended unto yourself[
column73: ]God, why do all this?[
column74: ]Someday, long from now, you will become like me. [
column75: ]You will mature to become what I am. [
column76: ]I'm a god?[
column77: ]No, not yet. you see, I was once where you stand right now...[
column78: ]It is not until you have lived every human life inside of your universe that I may take you from this place. [
column79: ]Once you have walked in the shoes of every race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, loving and hateful person, it is only then that you will understand how precious life truly is

column1: Welcome To Forever,This is real life, the only one we get to live[
column2: ]I remember being broke and thinking something gotta give[
column3: ]This is real life, everything we do is legendary[
column4: ]And we gon' do it to the day we in the cemetery[
column5: ]Real life, it feel like I'm dreaming[
column6: ]Used to feel like I was nothing, now my life has meaning[
column7: ]Said this is real life, god damn this is real life[
column8: ]Yeah, I've been fiending for this moment[
column9: ]I've been dreaming 'bout this moment[
column10: ]I guess this is how it feel to have everything you ever wanted[
column11: ]Writing these records like a dissertation[
column12: ]While the fans go crazy from anticipation[
column13: ]Damn, nine years that's a lot of patiences[
column14: ]And now I'm looking at my idols and feeling adjacent[
column15: ]It's hell of a long way from back in the basement[
column16: ]Looking at hip-hop tryna find my placement[
column17: ]I bought my first pair of Jordans at 22[
column18: ]Same year I bought a crib too[
column19: ]Now my face in magazines I used to flip through[
column20: ]And my music on all the sites I used to sift through[
column21: ]Remember meeting Nas for the first time[
column22: ]Shook his hand and he started quoting my lines[
column23: ]Said he a fan, god damn this is my time[
column24: ]I'mma get it, I'mma do it till we prime time[
column25: ]I told him every single day that I be at it[
column26: ]In the studio recording like an addict[
column27: ]He said that real hip-hop shit I had it[
column28: ]Thinking to myself, "Damn, man, you made Illmatic"[
column29: ]I used wonder what it feel like[
column30: ]Aight, I guess we back again[
column31: ]With another verse of about how much I'm black again[
column32: ]You don't like to blame God for my packaging[
column33: ]Bringing up my race, don't call me a white rapper then[
column34: ]Damn, they judging me by my skin tone[
column35: ]Instead of my talent, man these motherfuckers been wrong[
column36: ]But it's all good I just thought I'd address it[
column37: ]And spell it out for people so they can finally assess it[
column38: ]This is dedicated to anyone with a dream[
column39: ]And a realization of what following it means[
column40: ]Breaking the cycle and not following your genes[
column41: ]That perfect moment when your logic intervenes[
column42: ]And let you know that everything ain't always what it seems[
column43: ]But if you really looking, I promise you'll find your dreams[
column44: ]This is everything I ever wanted, half of y'all won't get it[
column45: ]The other will probably laugh and wonder how I did it[
column46: ]I just spit it from my mind, one word at the time[
column47: ]Take everything I'm going through and put it in a rhyme[
column48: ]I'd be lying if I said I didn't have a lot of weight upon my shoulders[
column49: ]But this is my therapy as I flow this[
column50: ]Spilling out my heart, I just hope somebody notice[
column51: ]I've been real from the start and you motherfuckers noticed[
column52: ]Once my name elevated that's when the fame escalated[
column53: ]But on the real, I've grown accustomed to the stares[
column54: ]People watching every move I make like it was theirs[
column55: ]All up in my business, and even in my personal affairs[
column56: ]Now, I know I talk a lot of game, but I ain't trynna sell you[
column57: ]Cause honestly, I could show you better than I could tell you[
column58: ]And even though there's been moments when everything have fell through[
column59: ]We kept it moving, assuming even the greatest fail too[
column60: ]I swear this business shit is do or die[
column61: ]I never contemplated suicide, I'm too alive[
column62: ]In front of thousands, but I'm talking like it's you and I[
column63: ]And everyday fewer find their dreams because fewer try[
column64: ]Everything I seen, made me everything I am[
column65: ]Everything I do, I'm a man behind mine[

column1: World Wide,And to immediately get into our show[
column2: ]I want to bring out the host of tonight's show[
column3: ]You all know him[
column4: ]A very wonderful, wonderful personality of show business[
column5: ]Now ain't it funny how the whole thing changed[
